base.param: Width of grid, must be positive.
Height of grid, must be positive.
base.exception: Thrown when sizeX or sizeY is negative.

default.summary: Create BridBuilder with default height and width.

method.name: AddShip
method.summary: Saves selected ship if it valid, remove it if invalid, then add new ship and select it.
method.exception: Thrown when ship can't fit in the grid.

method.name: SaveSelectedShip
method.summary: Saves selected ship if it valid, remove it if invalid.

method.name: SelectShip
method.summary: Select ship by special square. If no ship on that square, nothing will happen.
method.exception: Thrown when x or y is invalid for this grid.

method.name: MoveSelectedShip
method.summary: Move selected ship to 1 square in a certain direction. If it's impossible to move the ship, it won't move.
method.param: Direction to which the ship should be moved.

method.name: RotateSelectedShip
method.summary: Rotate selected ship. If it's impossible to rotate the ship, it won't rotate.

method.name: AddOnAllShipDestroyed
method.summary: Adds event that will be called after all ship destroying.

method.name: AddOnShipDestroyed
method.summary: Adds event that will be called for every ship destroying.

method.name: Rows
method.returns: Rows as collections of builder squares.

method.name: Build
method.returns: Grid instance, that represented by this grid builder.
